tooltipPaymentProcessingFee: Fee from the payment processor (may vary)
tooltipBasePrice: The amount the coach receives after fees and taxes.
tooltipPlatformFee: The service fee for using this platform.
tooltipVat: Value Added Tax, calculated on the pre-tax price.
tooltipTotal: The total amount the client pays.
addMethodDesc: Your new payment method will be saved securely.
stripeConnectDescription: Manage your Stripe account to receive payments from clients.
vatTooltip: As the platform operator, we are responsible for collecting and remitting this tax on your behalf.
stripeFeeTooltip: An estimate of the fee from our payment provider, Stripe. The final amount may vary slightly depending on the client's card type and origin.

sca.message: Your bank requires additional confirmation to authorize this payment for potential overtime.
sca.title: Confirm Payment Authorization
sca.savedOrNewMessage: Please select a saved payment method or enter new card details to authorize the overtime charge.
sca.enterCardMessage: Please enter your card details and confirm the authorization for potential overtime.
sca.pleaseWait: Please wait, this may take a moment.
sca.successMessage: The potential overtime charge has been authorized. The session time will be extended if needed.
sca.liveSessionSuccessMessage: Your payment method has been confirmed. Your session is being prepared...
sca.liveSessionMessage: To start your session, please confirm authorization for an initial block of time.

accountActive: Your Stripe account is active and ready to receive payments
setupIncompleteInfo: Please complete your Stripe account setup to start receiving payments
payNowDescription: Pay immediately to confirm your booking
payLaterDescription: Pay up to 48 hours before the session starts
sessionTooSoon: The session starts in less than 48 hours
processingMessage: Your payment is being processed. This may take a few seconds.
paymentFailedContact: Please contact support if the issue persists

error.title: Payment Error
error.recoveryInstructions: Please try again or use a different payment method
error.scaNotReady: Payment system is not ready. Please try again.
error.noMethodSelected: Please select a payment method or enter new card details.

tooltipDiscount: The discount amount deducted from the base price, based on the entered discount code.
tooltipPriceAfterDiscount: The price the customer pays after the discount is applied, before taxes and fees.
tooltipYouReceive: The final amount you will receive in your account after all fees and taxes are deducted from the net price.
